body_html:
@yongtang This PR is showing a significant performance regression in our internal monitoring. Can you please take a look?

Compare the benchmark before/after by running:

bazel test tensorflow/core/kernels:xent_op_test --test_arg=--benchmarks=all

Thanks.

body:
@yongtang This PR is showing a significant performance regression in our internal monitoring. Can you please take a look? 

Compare the benchmark before/after by running:

bazel test tensorflow/core/kernels:xent_op_test --test_arg=--benchmarks=all

Thanks.
